Title 1: As a Developer I want a clean folder structure for ease of use
As a Report Creator I want an easily accessible list of self service universes
As a Report Creator I want documentation on how to use a self service universe
As a Developer I want a Best Practices guide for creating a self service universe
As the AIM manager I need a report to detail universe usage to encourage further use
As a Report viewer I need access to my operational reports
As a Report Creator I need to be able to save to the correct folder
As a report Developer I need to be able to promote reports from Dev to QA and Dev to Production
As Analytics Manager I need the BOBJ system to be on a supported version
